pages.text: An oligopool is a synthetic mixture of DNA bases which are able to be used by the DNA Recombiner machine to selectively rebuild DNA from a map. They are produced by the Oligopool Machine by inserting Benzo-Solvent into it. There is a config option to require or not the use of RF Power for the machine. Hoppers (and modded equivalents) can be used to insert and extract from the machine.
